trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for embedded mail object collections in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente de email inserido coleções de objetos em um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elements of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection> object of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects.
trans-unit.target: A classe EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>elementos do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection>objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectsCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> objects define the content and format of the e-mail notification messages that are sent by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, and other controls.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objetos definem o conteúdo e o formato das mensagens de notificação de email que são enviados pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>e outros controles.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject> elements define the embedded objects within these e-mail messages.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>elementos definem os objetos inseridos dentro dessas mensagens de email.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObject>

trans-unit.source: The EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **EmbeddedObjects** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer.
trans-unit.target: O EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor é invocado selecionando as reticências (**... **) no botão de **EmbeddedObjects** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>método edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o provedor de serviço especificado e o contexto.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor> class when the user selects the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **EmbeddedObjects** property, under **MailDefinition**, in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, when designing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, or other control that encapsulates a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> object.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor>quando o usuário seleciona o botão de reticências (**... **) no botão de **EmbeddedObjects** propriedade, em **MailDefinition**, no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, durante a criação de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery>, ou outro controle que encapsula uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MailDefinition> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.PasswordRecovery> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ChangePassword> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CreateUserWizard> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.EmbeddedMailObjectCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Type> of the collection to edit.
Edits the value of the specified object using the specified service provider and context.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor do objeto especificado usando o provedor de serviço especificado e o contexto.

trans-unit.source: The EditValue method calls the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanging%2A> method of the `context` parameter, and then calls the EditValue base method.
trans-unit.target: As chamadas de método EditValue o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanging%2A>método o `context` método de base de parâmetro e, em seguida, chama o EditValue.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanging%2A>

trans-unit.source: Exceptions that are thrown are propagated back to the caller.
trans-unit.target: Exceções geradas são propagadas de volta para o chamador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanged%2A> method of `context` is called when the editing is complete.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanged%2A>método `context` é chamado quando a edição é concluída.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that is used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que é usado para obter informações de contexto adicional.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>por meio do qual edição services pode ser obtido.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para editar o valor.

trans-unit.source: The new value; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, value unchanged.
trans-unit.target: O novo value ; caso contrário, se o valor do objeto não foi alterado, value inalterado.
